title: Cannot Log in to EUNE
body: Hey all! I started to play league like an year ago. I was in Na server for a long time but there my average ping is 340 ms which is kind of slow and laggy to play. So I made a new Eune (getting 200 ms ping) account but suddenly i am not able to log in to my Eune account my client just always stucks at "Authenticating" I have tried to reinstall patches and all but nothing seem to work please help me. I am able to log in to Na server but not Eune.

replies.body:
NA and EUNE are completely separate servers, and sometimes you can connect to one perfectly fine and still have issues connecting to another. For some reason, your network is having a hard time making a stable connection to EUNE and can't get you logged in.

Check out the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can narrow down the main issue. Let me know how this helps!
